articles.description: Skipper Rohit Sharma spoke about his team's mindset and strategy after India got thrashed by Australia by 209 runs on Sunday in the World Test Championship final
articles.content: Skipper Rohit Sharma spoke about his team's mindset and strategy after India got thrashed by Australia by 209 runs on Sunday in the World Test Championship final at The Oval. India were chasing a who… [+2257 chars]

articles.author: Nikita Prasad
articles.title: ‘Bright spot in global economy’: India's GDP has touched $3.75 trillion-mark in 2023, says Nirmala Sitharaman | Mint - Mint
articles.description: At current prices, India's GDP ranks above the UK ($3,159 billion), France ($2,924 billion), Canada ($2,089 billion), Russia ($1,840 billion), and Australia ($1,550 billion) at current prices.
articles.content: India's gross domestic product (GDP) has touched the $3.75 trillion-mark in 2023 so far from around $2 trillion in 2014, said finance minister Nirmala Sitharaman on June 12. FM Sitharaman has called … [+3365 chars]
